description.summary: C++ and Qt bindings for GPGME (development files)
description.p: GpgME++ (aka GpgMEpp) is a C++ wrapper (or C++ bindings) for the GnuPG project's GPGME (GnuPG Made Easy) library.
QGpgME is a library that provides GPGME integration with QEventLoop and some Qt datatypes (e.g. QByteArray).
This package contains the headers and other files needed to compile against either of these libraries.
